attributes.action: INTODUCE ASSURITY WHEN BUYING  2ND HAND CARS
attributes.background: SO MANY DRIVERS ARE BUYING CHEAP CARS AND DRIVING AROUND WITHOUT INSURANCE  , COSTING ALL OF US MORE ON OUR INSURANCE . IF GOVERMENT TOOK AN ASSURITY ON ALL 2ND HAND CARS , WHICH YOU WOULD GET BACK WHEN YOU SHOW YOU HAVE CAR INSURED

rejection.details: Petitions need to ask clearly for a specific action from the Government or Parliament. We're not sure what you mean by "assurity".
